summary: This bill, the Methane Reduction and Economic Growth Act, proposes an incentive credit for capturing methane from mining activities. It amends Section 45Q of the Internal Revenue Code to provide a tax credit for the capture and use of qualified methane, defining qualified methane and methane capture equipment, and setting conditions for its application, including facility construction deadlines and minimum capture amounts. The amendments apply to methane captured after December 31, 2024.
